content: before adding to the strands to tighten the gap the next 2 -6 threads are added 1 -3 each to strand 1 and 4 or strands 2 and 3 of the braid as before cross the threads before adding to the strands to tighten the gap you will need more threads per braiding as the strands grow thicker go on braiding until 2 cm above the beginning of the heel now you start to remove 2 threads from strand 4 and put them aside while you add both new threads to strand 1 after 4 repeats you leave out one thread more than you added in the braid before until every strand of the braid has not more than 2-3 threads see video https //youtu be/aigtb8mbhl8 when the braid is done to the cuff go on braiding with 4 strands for another 3-6 cm 1 25-2 5 in see video https //youtu be/qralop2zcfk fix the ends e g with a knot repeat this at the other side this time putting the first thread over the 2nd and the 4th thread under the 3rd and putting threads aside to the backside of the sock again cut the threads to a length about 4-6 cm 1 5-2 5 in be careful they are loosening a little bit so add a little extra length this works with a 3-stranded braid too but it doesn t lie as flat as the 4-stranded braid and you have to feed the new threads to the braid from both sides to get an even appearance list of helpful videos several varieties of cable rightleaning https //www youtube com/watch v=r5afwlwvrsu several varieties of cable leftleaning https //www youtube com/watch v=zca6m3u6sy4&t=46 front chart row 7 https //youtube com/shorts/uwwx96xwws4 decreases at the front chart https //youtu be/fdno3jiweko braiding with 4 strands https //youtu be/fmm8vwydt50 beginning of braiding short version https //youtu be/-pu__ajrllm beginning of braiding -
